Subject: do not want to logs of novasolingredients.com
Description: We have enabled shadow copy for the email and browsers, and we are receiving the logs. However, the customer does not want logs from their domain (novasolingredients.com). Is it possible to exclude this on Endpoint Protector?
What_We_Know__c: In our remote session we went over the configurations of the Content Aware Policy, Deep Packet Inspection configurations, the settings applied on computers and we tested the scenario.  During our tests we observed that Endpoint Protector works as expected.  Internal email domains that are added to the Allowedlist had no event logs on a Report Only CAP policy while content sent to other email domains were reported.
Next_Steps__c: Endpoint Protector works as expected. case can be closed.
Solution_Comment__c: Endpoint Protector works as expected. case can be closed.
